channel.title: Teach me how to code please
channel.description:
Problem: I NEED TO LEARN HOW TO CODE
Server Base: none
Rating: 10
I know this is probobly REALLY bad for a SENIOR MEMBER asking this...but....CAN SOMEONE TEACH ME HOW TO CODE? :confused:

item.title: Teach me how to code please
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

You should read…you can’t learn it without doing nothing.

item.description:

just to let you i am a basic coder just started so i can teach you the basic but if you really want to lrean ask mod thorck
well first things first you need a source i use testscape

then if you tell me what you want to do i will tell you how to do it you can post here or pm me
